awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 5 nominations.

fullplot: Director Tomasz Sliwinski chronicles his family's life during the few months following the birth of their new born child who suffers from a very rare and incurable disease, the Ondine's curse (also known as congenital central hypoventilation syndrome or CCHS) which prevents breathing during sleep and requires a lifetime mechanical ventilation system.
plot: The film is a personal statement of the director and his wife, who have to deal with an incurable disease of their newborn son.
title: Our Curse
